noun.description: A beetle of the superfamily Palpicornia (now called Hydrophiloidea), many members of which are characterized by particularly long palps. Now rare.

adjective.description: Of or relating to the superfamily Palpicornia (Hydrophiloidea).

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in Ogilvie's Imperial Dictionary. From post-classical Latin palpus palp + classical Latin cornu horn, after French palpicornes. Compare scientific Latin Palpicornia, † Palpicornes.
